dependencies.description: Short read aligner for DNA and RNA-seq data.
dependencies.name: bbmap

dependencies.description: Basic Local Alignment Search Tool.
dependencies.name: blast-plus

dependencies.description: Burrow-Wheeler Aligner for pairwise alignment between DNA sequences.
dependencies.name: bwa

dependencies.description:
DIAMOND is a sequence aligner for protein and translated DNA searches,
designed for high performance analysis of big sequence data.
dependencies.name: diamond

dependencies.description: Pairwise sequence alignment of DNA and proteins
dependencies.name: exonerate

dependencies.description:
MAFFT is a multiple sequence alignment program for unix-like operating
systems. It offers a range of multiple alignment methods, L-INS-i
(accurate; for alignment of <~200 sequences), FFT-NS-2 (fast; for
alignment of <~30,000 sequences), etc.
dependencies.name: mafft

dependencies.description:
GNU parallel is a shell tool for executing jobs in parallel using one or
more computers. A job can be a single command or a small script that has
to be run for each of the lines in the input.
dependencies.name: parallel

dependencies.description:
A distributed collaborative effort to develop Python libraries and
applications which address the needs of current and future work in
bioinformatics.
dependencies.name: py-biopython

dependencies.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.
dependencies.name: py-matplotlib

dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.
dependencies.name: py-pandas

dependencies.description: Threading and multiprocessing eye-candy.
dependencies.name: py-pebble

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: A progress bar for Python 2 and Python 3
dependencies.name: py-progressbar2

dependencies.description:
psutil is a cross-platform library for retrieving information on running
processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network) in
Python.
dependencies.name: py-psutil

dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-scipy

dependencies.description:
Seaborn: statistical data visualization. Seaborn is a library for making
attractive and informative statistical graphics in Python. It is built
on top of matplotlib and tightly integrated with the PyData stack,
including support for numpy and pandas data structures and statistical
routines from scipy and statsmodels.
dependencies.name: py-seaborn

dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.
dependencies.name: py-wheel

dependencies.description: The Python programming language.
dependencies.name: python

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependencies.description:
SAM Tools provide various utilities for manipulating alignments in the
SAM format, including sorting, merging, indexing and generating
alignments in a per-position format
dependencies.name: samtools

dependencies.description:
SPAdes - St. Petersburg genome assembler - is intended for both standard
isolates and single-cell MDA bacteria assemblies.
dependencies.name: spades

description:
HybPiper was designed for targeted sequence capture, in which DNA
sequencing libraries are enriched for gene regions of interest,
especially for phylogenetics. HybPiper is a suite of Python scripts that
wrap and connect bioinformatics tools in order to extract target
sequences from high-throughput DNA sequencing reads
name: hybpiper

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
